title: Upgraded MySQL Crashes on Restart: Percona
author: Joab Jackson
description: Percona has found that upgrading MySQL to either versions 8.0.38, 8.4.1 or the recently released 9.0.0 will cause the database daemon to crash after restarting, at least in those cases where the database has 10,000 tables or more.
cntitle: 升级后的 MySQL 在重启时崩溃：Percona
cndescription: Percona 发现将 MySQL 升级到 8.0.38、8.4.1 或最近发布的 9.0.0 版本会导致数据库守护进程在重启后崩溃，至少在数据库拥有 10,000 个或更多表的情况下是如此。
